Stone_Fist.display_help: Your stone covered fists attack swiftly for moderate damage, and may Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Stone_Fist.display_short_help: Melee Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient,

Stone_Mallet.display_help: Your control over the earth allows you to form a mallet of solid stone. This Stone Mallet deals heavy damage, and can knock down weak foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Heavy_Mallet.display_help: A more impressive form of Stone Mallet, the Heavy Mallet deals more damage, but is slower to swing. It has a greater chance of knocking down opponents. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Taunt.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your earthen core with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Fault.display_help: This powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fault towards a targeted foe, throwing him and nearby enemies into the air and possibly Disorienting them. Fault deals no damage on its own. Recharge: Slow

Tremor.display_help: You can cause a localized earthquake immediately around you. This will deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Hurl_Boulder.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl_Boulder.display_target_help: You have been hit by a Hurled Boulder and cannot fly.

Seismic_Smash.display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Seismic_Smash.display_target_help: You have been immobilized by the crushing earth.
